data.title: The Golf Mag Vol.11 (Copy 1)
data.meta_description: COMPETITION SCROLL DOWN Competition closes 29 August 2024. data.text:
Win a fantastic golfing getaway at Nkonyeni Golf Estate in Swaziland for four people ‑ three nights' bed and breakfast, including two rounds of golf with a cart on the Bushveld Course and the Golden Eagle Links co-designed by Louis Oosthuizen and Peter Matkovich. To find out more about Nkonyeni, click hereEnter by answering one question online and each purchase on the online store will result in an additional entry. The lucky draw will take place on 15 November 2024. Shop here for an additional entry louis57online.co.za

POPIA TERMS AND CONDITIONS

By subscribing or entering these competitions, readers make themselves subject to receiving promotional information. GolfRSA will not rent or sell potentially personally identifying and personally identifying information to anyone. GolfRSA discloses potentially personally identifying and personally identifying information only to those of its employees and to The Golf Mag and Louis 57 wines that (i) need to know that information in order to process competition on GolfRSA's behalf or to provide services available at GolfRSA’s website, and (ii) that have agreed not to disclose it to others. All personal information (‘personal data’) supplied by participants shall be processed in accordance with South African data protection legislation and the promoter’s privacy policy. Entrants are deemed to have accepted these terms and conditions.
